title: AI Competency Enhancement: Value-Based Approaches for Inclusive and Sustainable STEM Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary math concepts (operations, geometry, measurement) and experience in primary education settings
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners design three or more mathematical problem-solving activities utilizing everyday materials and local culture

Learners apply AI-driven value-based creative pedagogy (e.g., generative AI-enabled collaborative activities) to design a 4-week learning plan reflecting three inclusive learning environment principles (e.g., accessibility, diversity, feedback systems), achieving at least 4 points on a peer evaluation rubric (5-point scale)

Learners develop one formative assessment tool implementable in Python or JavaScript within a mobile-based microlearning environment (Android/iOS platforms) over 2–4 weeks, achieving over 80% satisfaction rate from five peer learners

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
